column5: Thanks again all.
Love the 12 GA and poppy butts the most.  a hint of personal touch (per cx I guess) and style.  All are very impressive 'works' you have made Chris.  WELL DONE SIR, WELL DONE!!!!
Where did that piece of spalted maple you have go? That was one of the best looking seats I have ever seen.
Where did that piece of spalted maple you have go? That was one of the best looking seats I have ever seen.  This one Tom?
That's the one! Love that pattern.
Thanks Tom. I hadn't included it as it's not completely finished yet. But I agree it is a beauty.
Absolutely beautiful. x2-stunning work man Absolutely Stunning--would be afraid to fish with one Spiel to be honest
Once again, very nice work!  I know I was going to contact you about 1 of your creations, but I'd cry if I got even a slight scratch on it.  Your rod with the spalted maple is outstanding!
I love making beautiful and functional pieces of work from burls and spalts.
wow works of art, and you can fish with them too
Thinking outside the box. Nice butts dude. Thats amagination.
Absolutely beautiful.
You sir, are the Picasso of the rod! Good wood
???  Your a visionary and an elite craftsman!  Mind boggling good work sir!
Beautiful work Chris
Heard you were good with wood Chris  . Wish the first one was mine!!
Some beautiful pieces of work Chris
Wow! I have lots of burls on my property but I don't have the skills or tools to turn them into works of art like you do. Very impressive work you do
Absolutely beautiful work Chris
Stunning pieces of work  art!!
Nice work Chris!  I love the colors!  Wow!
Thanks guys.
Those are sharp lookin'!

Nice work my friend, the one you built for me looks better, only thing I have some scales to be cleaned off mine. Do you do Butt cleaning? Now get back to work, we have a meeting tonight  so Harvey says. How's misses Brooks?

Nice work my friend, the one you built for me looks better, only thing I have some scales to be cleaned off mine. Do you do Butt cleaning? Now get back to work, we have a meeting tonight  so Harvey says. How's misses Brooks?  You Sir are a weirdo!
As a lover of wood, I applaud you...nice work
wow, that is some amazing workmanship.
speechless! Amazing work!
Unbelievable Speil, you continually raise the bar, and stretch the boundaries, of rod building craftsmanship
Very nice as always!

Nice work my friend, the one you built for me looks better, only thing I have some scales to be cleaned off mine. Do you do Butt cleaning? Now get back to work, we have a meeting tonight  so Harvey says. How's misses Brooks?   You Sir are a weirdo!   No, he,s a newf with great humor.  Right bye .LOL
No, he,s a newf with great humor.  Right bye .LOL You goter Bro Who has more fun than People Now if I could get miss Brooks to bite him in the butt

The difference between an inanimate object and art is that one will evoke emotion from a human being. Your work evokes emotion. You should be immensely proud of your talent and work. Steelworkers can be artists too, you are proving it.
